name: Bug Blaster (coneycode)
description:
Major Changes:

  1. Added player dash ability (bound to Left Shift)
  2. Added Weapon-selection Wheel (hold Left Control then select from the radial wheel by moving your mouse in the right direction, confirm by releasing control)
  3. Created a custom song for the boss battle level (please hang out and listen after you beat the boss. He's too easy and I made the song too long :D) 

(Sorry, peer-reviewers, I couldn't get the WebGL build working for some reason)
